snippet: Like the 2012 M5 sedan, the cars have had their V-10s swapped out for a twin-turbocharged V-8.
abstract: Like the 2012 M5 sedan, the cars have had their V-10s swapped out for a twin-turbocharged V-8.
lead_paragraph: After a two-year absence, the BMW M6 coupe and convertible are returning to the German automaker's lineup, with the hardtop scheduled to be unveiled at the Geneva auto show next month. The drop-top variant arrives at the New York auto show about a month later.

headline.main: BMW Releases Details on M6 Coupe and Convertible
